name: Zombie sheep
description:
Purpose for player:

Drive the zombie sheeps into the fence by using searchlight because they’re afraid of light.

Gameplay rules:

1.Searchlight cannot work without power.

2.Protect teammates from zombie sheeps.

3.Zombie sheeps will stop being aggressive once they stepped into the fence.

4.Remaining time will be reduced if zombie sheeps go out of the edge on the left.

5.Close the gate of fence to prevent the zombie sheeps from escaping.
